<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Skeletal Giant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=375)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The reanimated bones of giants make excellent necromantic thralls.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Skeletal Giant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=375)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 299</row>

**Perception** +7; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +1

**Con** +3

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Half Plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=12)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 50
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious

**Resistances**
cold 5, electricity 5, fire 5, piercing 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
glaive +12 ([deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+7 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
horns +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d10+5 piercing

**Broad Swipe** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The giant makes two Strikes with its glaive against two adjacent foes, both of whom are within its reach. The multiple attack penalty does not increase until after both attacks are resolved.

**Terrifying Charge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The giant Strides and makes a horns Strike with a +4 circumstance bonus to damage. If the strike hits, the giant attempts to Demoralize the target.

</column>
